div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 246 Peloponnesus, 1936 Burial: c. 175-150 B.C. (T) Contents: 35 AR Alexander III: 1 tetradr.; 4 dr. Philip III: 1 tetradr.; 1 dr. Corinth: 1 triob. Sicyon: 2 dr.; 19 triob.; 1 ob. Achaean League: 4 triob. Arcadian League: 1 triob. Disposition: Athens Information from M. Oeconomides
